Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.turn

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SetupTurn
    turn used during game setup: when players have to choose their god or they have to place their workers on the board
    Turn  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AthenaTurn
    Type of Turn used when one of the players uses Athena
    BasicTurn
    Type of Turn to be used after setup is finished
    SetupGodsTurn
    turn used when players have to choose their god card
    SetupWorkersTurn
    turn used when players have to place their workers in the board
